What features would you like to see in a: As a graduate student, I would like to see a digital banking service that helps me manage my budget and save money. It would be great if the service could offer personalized spending insights and recommendations based on my spending habits. Also, I would like to have easy-to-use goal-setting tools to help me track my progress towards my financial goals. Finally, it would be useful if the service could categorize my spending automatically and allow me to create custom budgets for different categories of expenses.

How often do you use mobile banking serv: I use mobile banking services almost every day to check my account balance, transfer money between accounts, and pay bills.

What would make you switch to a differen: If I found a digital banking service that offered better features, more convenience, and better customer service, I would consider switching to it. Also, if the new service had lower fees or better interest rates, it would be a strong incentive for me to switch.

How important is it for you to have freq: As an introverted and busy person, I don't necessarily need frequent engagement with my credit union through their mobile app. However, it's important for me to have easy access to my account information and to be able to perform transactions quickly and securely whenever I need to. If the credit union's mobile app offers useful features and a seamless user experience, I would be more likely to use it frequently.

What concerns do you have about using a: As someone who values security and privacy, my main concern about using a new digital banking service is the safety of my personal and financial information. I would want to make sure that the service uses strong encryption and authentication methods to protect my data from hackers and identity thieves. Additionally, I would want to know that the service has a reliable and responsive customer support team that can assist me if I encounter any issues or have questions about the service.

On a scale of 1-10, how likely are you t: As someone who is interested in managing my finances and achieving my financial goals, I would rate my likelihood of signing up for the new digital banking service at 8 out of 10. The personalized spending insights and recommendations, easy-to-use goal-setting tools, and automatic categorization of spending are all features that appeal to me. However, I would need to know more about the security and privacy measures in place before making a final decision.

What could we do to make you more likely: To make me more likely to sign up for the new digital banking service, it would be helpful to have more information about the security and privacy measures in place to protect my personal and financial information. It would also be beneficial to have a clear and transparent fee structure, as well as competitive interest rates on savings and loans. Additionally, if the service offers a user-friendly interface and reliable customer support, it would make me feel more comfortable using the service and more likely to recommend it to others.
